article.name: Linked Products
article.description: Metafield → Select products. In content:

product.name: Google: Custom Product
product.description: Use to indicate whether or not the unique product identifiers (UPIs) GTIN, MPN, and brand are available for your product.

product.name: Search product boosts
product.description: List of search queries for which a product gets higher rank in search results

product.name: Related products
product.description: List of related products

product.name: Related products settings
product.description: Determines how related products are displayed along with algorithmic product recommendations

product.name: Complementary products
product.description: List of complementary products

product.name: Dietary preferences
product.description: Helps identify products suitable for specific diets, e.g. vegan, nut free

product.name: Country
product.description: Specifies the country associated with the product, such as Japan or Germany

product.name: Benefits - Description
product.description: Short Description

product.name: Benefits - List
product.description: Bullet points list

product.name: Allergen information
product.description: Indicates potential allergens present in food or beverages, such as wheat or peanuts

product.name: Heat level
product.description: Indicates the spiciness of food and beverage products, such as mild or very hot

product.name: Flour/Grain type
product.description: Specifies the type of grain or flour in a product, e.g. corn, wheat

product.name: Tool/Utensil material
product.description: Identifies the main material used in a tool or utensil, like stainless steel or teak wood

product.name: Color
product.description: Defines the primary color or pattern, such as blue or striped

product.name: Theme
product.description: Describes the product's primary theme or motif, such as sport, space, or holidays

product.name: Cleaning instructions
product.description: Guides on the recommended cleaning method, such as dishwasher safe or hand wash only

product.name: Cookware/Bakeware material
product.description: Identifies the main material used in cookware or bakeware, like stainless steel or ceramic

product.name: Compatible stove top type
product.description: Identifies the type of stove tops the product can be used with, such as gas or induction

product.name: Cookware items included
product.description: Details the components of a cookware set, such as dutch oven or frying pan

product.name: Heating instructions
product.description: Specifies how to properly heat the product, e.g. oven, stovetop

product.name: Food product form
product.description: Specifies the form in which the food product is presented, such as dried or frozen

product.name: Fat content
product.description: Specifies the amount of fat in food and beverage products, e.g. full fat, low fat

product.name: Flavor
product.description: Specifies the taste or flavor of a product, e.g. vanilla, mint

product.name: Package type
product.description: Defines the type of packaging for a product, e.g. jar, pump

product.name: Dietary supplements
product.description: Identifies the added nutrients in a product, like calcium or probiotics

product.name: Brandy variety
product.description: Distinguishes between different brandy styles, e.g. cognac, grappa

product.name: Chocolate type
product.description: Defines the variety of chocolate based on its ingredients and cocoa content, e.g. dark chocolate, milk chocolate

product.name: Nut butter variety
product.description: Identifies the nut variety in nut-based spreads, e.g. peanut, almond

product.name: Wine variety
product.description: Helps distinguish between different kinds of wines, e.g. white, rosé

product.name: Liqueur variety
product.description: Classifies liqueurs by their primary flavor profiles, e.g. nut, cream

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 4
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 3
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 2
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 1
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns

variant.name: Google: Custom Label 0
variant.description: Label that you assign to a product to help organize bidding and reporting in Shopping campaigns

variant.name: Google: Size System
variant.description: The country of the size system used by your product.

variant.name: Google: Gender
variant.description: The gender for which your product is intended.

variant.name: Google: Condition
variant.description: The condition of your product at time of sale.

variant.name: Google: Age Group
variant.description: The demographic for which your product is intended.
